pullrequest.title: [Citadel] FrameSemantics API: add FrameAttachedToGraph and helper functions

content.raw: I don't think so. We certainly add it to the map, so confirming that the count is not zero is more like an assert than an error to report. It also shouldn't have more than 1 entry, since `__model__` and `world` are reserved names. I wasn't sure, though so I included it. If it's not possible, then we won't be able to get any test coverage for it
